mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user a SET a.`account` = #{account}, a.`password` = #{password}, a.`lastLoginIp` = #{lastLoginIp}, a.`lastLoginTime` = #{lastLoginTime}, a.`loginCount` = #{loginCount}, a.isEnable = #{isEnable} WHERE a.`id` = #{id}
mapper.select:

AND a.account like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%')
ORDER BY a.createTime DESC
